title: Introduction to Examples
desc: An introduction describing the format of MUQ's examples.

title: Explanation of C++ Examples
desc: An introductory example describing how MUQ uses IPython to construct c++ examples.

title: Simple one input model components
desc: This is basic example demonstrating how to create one input model components by creating a child of OneInputNoDerivModPiece.  The example is written in Python and uses a simple predator prey ODE for illustration.
